desc.zh:
洛阳轨道交通（Luoyang Subway），是服务于中国河南省洛阳市的城市轨道交通系统，其首条线路（洛阳轨道交通1号线）于2020年12月1日开始试运行，于2021年3月28日正式开通运营。使洛阳成为中西部非省会城市中第一个开通地铁的城市。
截至2021年12月，洛阳轨道交通已开通运营线路2条，为洛阳轨道交通1号线（一期）、洛阳轨道交通2号线（一期）；规划线路2条，为洛阳轨道交通3号线、洛阳轨道交通4号线；线网共设车站34座。
desc.en:
Luoyang Rail Transit is an urban rail transit system serving Luoyang City, Henan Province, China, and its first line (Luoyang Rail Transit Line 1) began trial operation on December 1, 2020 and was officially opened for operation on March 28, 2021. Luoyang became the first city in the central and western regions to open a subway.
As of December 2021, Luoyang Rail Transit has opened 2 operating lines, namely Luoyang Rail Transit Line 1 (Phase I) and Luoyang Rail Transit Line 2 (Phase I); There are 2 planned lines, namely Luoyang Rail Transit Line 3 and Luoyang Rail Transit Line 4; There are 34 stations in the line network.
